tags.label: dot-binary-file-preview
tags.description: Represent a dotcms text field for the binary file preview.

attributes.label: delete-label
attributes.description: (optional) Delete button's label

attributes.label: file-name
attributes.description: file name to be displayed

attributes.label: preview-url
attributes.description: (optional) file URL to be displayed

tags.label: dot-binary-file
tags.description: Represent a dotcms binary file control.

attributes.label: u-r-l-validation-message
attributes.description: (optional) Text that be shown when the URL is not valid

attributes.label: accept
attributes.description: (optional) Describes a type of file that may be selected by the user, separated by comma  eg: .pdf,.jpg

attributes.label: button-label
attributes.description: (optional) Text that be shown in the browse file button

attributes.label: disabled
attributes.description: (optional) Disables field's interaction

attributes.label: error-message
attributes.description: (optional) Text that be shown in the browse file button

attributes.label: hint
attributes.description: (optional) Hint text that suggest a clue of the field

attributes.label: label
attributes.description: (optional) Text to be rendered next to input field

attributes.label: max-file-length
attributes.description: (optional) Set the max file size limit

attributes.label: name
attributes.description: Name that will be used as ID

attributes.label: placeholder
attributes.description: (optional) Placeholder specifies a short hint that describes the expected value of the input field

attributes.label: preview-image-name
attributes.description: (optional) Name of the file uploaded

attributes.label: preview-image-url
attributes.description: (optional) URL of the file uploaded

attributes.label: required
attributes.description: (optional) Determine if it is mandatory

attributes.label: required-message
attributes.description: (optional) Text that be shown when required is set and condition not met

attributes.label: validation-message
attributes.description: (optional) Text that be shown when the Regular Expression condition not met
